lemma DynProcProcPar': assumes adapt: "P \<subseteq> {s. p s = q \<and> (\<exists>Z. init s \<in> P' Z \<and> (\<forall>t \<in> Q' Z. return s t \<in> R s t) \<and> (\<forall>t \<in> A' Z. return s t \<in> A))}" assumes result: "\<forall>s t. \<Gamma>,\<Theta>\<turnstile>\<^bsub>/F \<^esub>(R s t) result s t Q,A" assumes q: "\<forall>Z. \<Gamma>,\<Theta>\<turnstile>\<^bsub>/F \<^esub>(P' Z) Call q (Q' Z),(A' Z)" shows "\<Gamma>,\<Theta>\<turnstile>\<^bsub>/F \<^esub>P dynCall init p return result Q,A"
